scripts.appsync.ios: nativescript-app-sync release AppSyncDemoNgIOS ios --description 'Awesome iOS ng version!'
scripts.appsync.ios.mandatory: nativescript-app-sync release AppSyncDemoNgIOS ios --mandatory --description 'Mandatory iOS ng version!'
scripts.appsync.android: nativescript-app-sync release AppSyncDemoNgAndroid android --description 'Awesome Android ng version!'
scripts.appsync.android.mandatory: nativescript-app-sync release AppSyncDemoNgAndroid android --mandatory --description 'Awesome Android mandatory ng version!'
scripts.appsync.android.v2: nativescript-app-sync release AppSyncDemoNgAndroid android --description 'Awesome Android ng version!' --targetBinaryVersion 2.0.0
scripts.appsync.android.release: nativescript-app-sync release AppSyncDemoNgAndroid android -deploymentName Staging --build --isReleaseBuildType --keystorePath "/Users/eddyverbruggen/Desktop/werkmap/Android dev X-Services/xservices.keystore" --keystorePassword YOUR_PASSWORD --keystoreAlias xservices --keystoreAliasPassword YOUR_PASSWORD
scripts.build.plugin: cd ../src && npm i && npm run build && npm run package
